title: Tablecover, 19th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: cutwork, needle lace and needlework on knotted net
description: Checkerboard arrangement of squares of punto in aria with geometric motifs alternating with squares of fabric which have rosettes cutouts filled in with needlelace. Border of punto in aria. Scalloped needlelace edging.

tombstone.epitaph:
Tablecover, 19th century.Medium: linen
Technique: cutwork, needle lace and needlework on knotted net. 1974-8-15.
